text: Can you modify my appointment with doctor Smith on October 10th, 2023 to doctor Johnson on October 15th, 2023?
Sure, please provide me with your appointment ID and the new appointment date and doctor name.
My appointment ID is 90123456 and I would like to see Dr. Johnson on October 15th, 2023 instead.
Okay, I will modify your registration now.
Your appointment has been successfully modified.
